main module¶

main.py

The main file to run the dash application.

main.change_snr(snr, sta)¶
main.check_for_none(*args)¶
main.display_graph_initial(station)¶
main.display_graph_update(npos, fig)¶
main.display_selected_data(vals)¶
main.is_auto_bandwidth(fig, pos)¶
main.trace_in_fig(fig: plotly.graph_objs._figure.Figure, name: str) → bool¶

Looks for the trace with a given name and returns True if it exists or False if it does not.

Parameters

  • fig (plotly.graph_ojects.Figure) – A figure object to be checked.

  • name (str) – The name of the trace to look for.

Returns

tr (bool)

Return type

True if the trace is in figure, False otherwise.
